title: 25 Years Ago Steve Jobs Launched the First iMac—and the Strategy That Saved Apple
description: The curvy translucent plastic design of the iMac was the test case for Steve Jobs' “whole-widget” strategy that led to the creation of the iPhone.

title: In the Dreams Favela, Wi-Fi and Ecommerce Promise a Better Future
description: A tech-led initiative to bring economic development to Brazil’s shantytowns starts with a radical idea: Listen to the people who live there.
